page.title: 18PARTRIDGE GREEN PARRY'S SHOP
page.content: PARRY'S GROCERS SHOP with it's brightly coloured red and brown sun canopy is situated in the middle of the HIGH STREET.For the customers who arrive by car there is a small layby outside.The shop OPENS from 8.30am. until 1.00pm. CLOSES for lunch and REOPENS from 2.15pm. until 5.30pm. EVERY DAY except SUNDAY.Whilst most villagers do their MAIN SHOPPING in HORSHAM or WORTHING, PARRY'S is nevertheless a convenient, busy shop used by locals for such items as bread,milk and catfood and by children for crisps and sweets before and after school.MR.PARRY who arrived from South Africa 4 years ago lives with his family above the shop.He employs 6 staff mainly on a part time basis.It is a friendly,helpful shop.
